name: Edward Witten
doctoral_students: Cumrun Vafa   Xiao-Gang Wen   Eva Silverstein   Shamit Kachru   Sergei Gukov , Dror Bar-Natan
known_for: String Theory   Superstring Theory, M-Theory  Quantum Gravity  Quantum Field Theory https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Topological_quantum_field_theory Topological Quantum Field Theory, Non-Commutative Quantum Field Theories, Low-dimensional Geometry, Supersymmetry Morse Theory, Chern-Simons Theory, Knot Theory, Generalizing the Jones Polynomial, Relating Hodge-de Rham Theory to Supersymmetric QFT, Witten Conjecture, New proof of the Positive Energy Theorem, Rigidity Theorems, Gauge-Gravity Duality, Seiberg-Witten Invariants
work_institution: Institute for Advanced Study, Harvard University, California Institute of Technology, Princeton University
